comparison_summary: Week 2 showed improvements in several engagement metrics compared to Week 1. Notably, there was an increase in the average sessions, pageviews, transactions, and revenue, while bounce rate and session duration both decreased slightly. The conversion rate saw a significant improvement, indicating a higher effectiveness in user engagement and action completion. However, the number of users and new users remained relatively stable across the two weeks.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average Sessions
key_metrics_comparison.description: The average sessions increased from 1543.43 in Week 1 to 1682.57 in Week 2, indicating a growth of about 9%.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average Users
key_metrics_comparison.description: Average users slightly decreased from 1265.14 in Week 1 to 1237.86 in Week 2, marking a marginal decline, suggesting stable user retention.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average New Users
key_metrics_comparison.description: The average new users decreased slightly from 427.29 in Week 1 to 424.14 in Week 2, indicating a very small drop in new user acquisition.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average Pageviews
key_metrics_comparison.description: Average pageviews rose from 6225.86 in Week 1 to 6891.71 in Week 2, an increase of approximately 10.7%.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Pages per Session
key_metrics_comparison.description: Pages per session saw a small increase from 4.01 in Week 1 to 4.07 in Week 2, reflecting slightly higher per-session engagement.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average Session Duration
key_metrics_comparison.description: Average session duration decreased from 163.1 seconds in Week 1 to 153.88 seconds in Week 2, indicating shorter session times.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Bounce Rate
key_metrics_comparison.description: Bounce rate improved from 20% in Week 1 to 16.06% in Week 2, showing better user retention and engagement.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Conversion Rate
key_metrics_comparison.description: Conversion rate increased significantly from 2.8% in Week 1 to 4.25% in Week 2, demonstrating enhanced goal achievement.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average Transactions
key_metrics_comparison.description: Average transactions rose from 34.14 in Week 1 to 49.43 in Week 2, a substantial increase of about 44.8%.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average Revenue
key_metrics_comparison.description: Average revenue increased from $1622.53 in Week 1 to $2087.17 in Week 2, representing a 28.6% boost in earnings.
